804630.name: The Short Story of a Drifting Labyrinth OST
804630.description:
The Short Story of a Drifting Labyrinth OST is made up of 65 tracks from The Short Story of a Drifting Labyrinth. It also includes some tracks that weren't used in the game! Over 70 minutes of music in total.

1. Emma (1:13)
2. Entry (0:56)
3. Soft (0:43)
4. Quick and Easy (0:27)
5. Still (3:40)

All tracks come in MP3 format and can be found in the "Music" section of your Steam library (mouse over the "Library" tab in the Steam app an then pick "Music"). Under the "Play Album" option, there is an option to "Show in System." If you select that option, you can see the album in a folder on your system. You are free to copy those music files or the entire album file to any of your other devices or music players. Make sure to copy the "The Short Story of a Drifting Labyrinth OST" file and not any of the other game files by accident.
